column5: Saw guys digging thru some tow bars in BPS a week back. Didn't pay them much attention though..
Not a bad idea to start with ... i will give it a shot and call them,..  thanks irish,"
Yes, they are at Bass Pro, but they had a very limited selection left.  Joey
They had a good selection at Gagnons the other day when I was in there.  Now are you looking for a tow bar or the hitch for your sled?  If you need it for your sled try Royal Distributing
If you can send me a shot of your connection at the rear of the sled,I could make one up for ya. Probly stronger then what ever you can buy. We can work out a price.
Will they miss the steel Brian! LOL
I was thinking of using your shop, and your Aluminum.
Of course,I would split the profits, as you would be doing the welding.  Serious though,if your interested,give me a PM.
royal distributing as mentioned, could also try your local yamaha dealer won't be as bad as you think for a tow bar made for your sled
I went to aselstiens this afternoon,..  they don't have the one made for the machine until febuary or march...  so i got one that fits over the back frame rail....  and maybe we can weld something..
